item.title: MoneyWeek news quiz: How much will a 2026 FIFA World Cup final ticket cost?
item.description: The 2026 World Cup, Netflix, and the cost of care all made headlines this week. How closely were you following this week’s top stories?

item.title: Who is Christopher Harborne, crypto billionaire and Reform UK’s new mega-donor?
item.description: Christopher Harborne came into the spotlight when it emerged he had given £9 million to Nigel Farage's Reform UK. How did he make his millions?

item.title: Rachel Reeves's punishing rise in business rates will crush the British economy
item.description: By piling more and more stealth taxes onto businesses, the government is repeating exactly the same mistake of its first Budget, says Matthew Lynn

item.title: The best UK Christmas markets for a wassail of a time
item.description: We round up the best UK Christmas markets to visit, from London's Hyde Park Winter Wonderland to Edinburgh's Princes Street Gardens
